room_title: Escape room "Twisted" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: My friends and I LOVE coming here!! We went tonight and did twisted and had so much fun. We love our girl Mimi and the rest of the staff there!! 10/10 recommend coming here!

room_title: Escape room "Twisted" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Twisted was great! The room was challenging and Mimi was a great game master!
